dimension: 23 3/8 x 17 1/16 in. (59.37 x 43.34 cm) (without ties or fringe)
title: Woman's Front Apron
description: long apron in black with white geometric embroidery (one green area); blue and red fabric trim with cross-stitch embellished panel at top; two types of fringe; woven ties
creditline: The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art
